member.name: WS_XML_ELEMENT_NODE
member.summary: Represents a start element in xml (e.g. <a:purchaseOrder xmlns:a="http://tempuri.org" id="5">)

member.name: WS_XML_ELEMENT_NODE.node
member.summary: The base type for all types that derive from .

member.name: WS_XML_ELEMENT_NODE.prefix
member.summary: The prefix of the element. In the example, it refers to "a". Empty prefixes are represented by a zero length .

member.name: WS_XML_ELEMENT_NODE.localName
member.summary: The localName of the element. In the example, it refers to "purchaseOrder".

member.name: WS_XML_ELEMENT_NODE.ns
member.summary: The resolved namespace of the prefix. In the example, it refers to "http://tempuri.org".

member.name: WS_XML_ELEMENT_NODE.attributeCount
member.summary: The number of attributes on the element. In the example, it would be 2.

member.name: WS_XML_ELEMENT_NODE.attributes
member.summary: The array of attributes for the element.

member.name: WS_XML_ELEMENT_NODE.isEmpty
member.summary: Whether the element is an empty element or not. In the example, it would be FALSE.
